name: The AC||DC Tour - "Art Culture and Divinity Connect" around the city of Seven Islands "Mumbai".
description: You can explore the city's art and culture of the city which is known for its cosmopolitan nature, vibrancy and a lively spirit, Which is a result of people from different backgrounds, religions and regions. Meet new people, new ways, new horizons, and a new you in the end. Have an Art workshop if you have time. Visit to best of the spas, water parks, beaches. You can also explore the beautiful nature sceneries on the outskirts of the city if you are a nature lover.
